extendedInfo.description: Note: This is the green version of the theme. Blue version here: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.jb.gosms.pctheme.metrosevenblueâ â â â â Instruction for applying iOS 7 fonts can be found below to exactly match the screenshots.Apple recently unveiled their brand new operating system - iOS 7. We, at Metrothemers, have designed a theme for GO SMS users that truly imitates the design of iOS 7's messaging system. Download the theme and enjoy!Installation:You must have GO SMS Pro installed to use this theme! (Freely available on Play Store)1. Install GO SMS Pro.2. Install the theme. Do not open it. You might get a Force close3. Apply the theme via GO SMS Menu> Themes> Installed> Select "iOS7" and "Apply"â â â â â Instructions for applying iOS 7 HelveticaNeue Light Fonts (Screenshots 4-6):1. You must have Facebook installed (Doesn't matter if you use it or not) on your device for this as it includes the Helvetica Fonts Family.2. From GO SMS Settings>Advanced>Appearance Settings>Select 'Scan font packages'. This will take a while.3. After the scan is complete, all fonts on your device will be available for your use. Apply 'HelveticaNeue Light' font to all sections in appearance settings.4. That's it. Enjoy and show this off to your friends!For suggestions, issues, questions, shoot us a mail at metrothemers@gmail.comKeywords: iPhone, iOS, apple, ipad, GO, theme, itheme, green

reviews.title: Beautiful
reviews.comment: Looks great but would be nice to have the blue theme included or maybe have a buy one get one half off deal, looks great though and don\'t have any regrets buying it
reviews.author: Jesse Tatum

reviews.title: Beautiful
reviews.comment: I bought a lot of themes and most of my paid themes cannot be applied anymore. This one is so clean. I hope this is a keeper. Great job!
reviews.author: LOUIE CAMESA

reviews.title: Love it!!
reviews.comment: Absolutely stunning, exactly like the iOS 7 SMS theme. Well done guys!
reviews.author: Mostafa Hamdy

reviews.title: Just like the pics
reviews.comment: Amazing...and great support!  Dev got me set up quickly... If u don\'t get it at first due to a go SMS bug email Dev and he will fix it for you.
reviews.author: Matt Grainger

reviews.title: Can\'t wait!
reviews.comment: Not working on my Galaxy S2, but developers responded quickly just waiting for a solution. Theme looks great can\'t wait.
reviews.author: Maykel Contreras

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Took about 5 hours to get an email to fix the jelly bean problem and it was well worth waiting for! App works and looks great! Very much worth $2.00
reviews.author: Braydon Crowe

reviews.title: Nice Theme
reviews.comment: All some theme just like the other two I have brought from Jordan very good dev to buy from very happy with theme
reviews.author: Larry Gigabyte

reviews.title: Excellent!
reviews.comment: Didn\'t work on xperia s at first. Sent quick email and responsed pretty fast, resolved the problem, working fine. Best ios7 theme!
reviews.author: Keil sahota

reviews.title: Love it!
reviews.comment: Didn\'t work at first but developer provided a solution within a hour. Very happy with the support!
reviews.author: Eithan Skinner

reviews.title: Great Developer Support
reviews.comment: The theme itself looks super sharp,  I have an iPhone 5 on the iOS 7 beta and this is as close as it gets on Android. Ut didn\'t work at first,  but after a quick email to the devs my issue was resolved in about 16 minutes.  Awesome theme and awesome support
reviews.author: Nathan Tran

reviews.title: Great devs
reviews.comment: Had a problem with the app and the developers responded within an hour with a fix.
reviews.author: Daniel Riley

reviews.comment: The app actually looks just like ios 7. The only problem I had was I had to contact the developer to fix a black and white color error on my gs3. Although, they got back with me fast and it worked out.
reviews.author: wendy arnold
